Package net.consensys.cava.junit

Utilities for better junit testing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BouncyCastleExtension
    A junit5 extension, that installs a BouncyCastle security provider.
    RedisServerExtension
    A junit5 extension, that sets up an ephemeral Redis server for tests.
    TempDirectoryExtension
    A junit5 extension, that provides a temporary directory for tests.
    VertxExtension
    A junit5 extension, that provides a Vert.X instance for tests.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    RedisPort
    A parameter annotation for injecting the running Redis server port into junit5 tests.
    TempDirectory
    A parameter annotation for injecting a temporary directory into junit5 tests.
    VertxInstance
    A parameter annotation for injecting a temporary Vert.X instance into junit5 tests.

Package net.consensys.cava.junit Description

Utilities for better junit testing.

These classes are included in the standard Cava distribution, or separately when using the gradle dependency 'net.consensys.cava:cava-junit' (cava-junit.jar).
